sentences.en: He felt curiously detached from what was going on.
sentences.cn: 他觉得很奇怪,对于正在发生的事情感到超然物外.

sentences.en: He tries to remain emotionally detached from the prisoners, but fails.
sentences.cn: 他试图不带感情地对待那些犯人，但是做不到。

sentences.en: Hs is a little detached, " both in and out the game ".
sentences.cn: 他是有一点落落寡合, “ 不论在局内,还是在局外. ”

sentences.en: It is written in a detached, precise style.
sentences.cn: 行文冷静客观，一针见血。

sentences.en: It was an ordinary, post-war semi-detached.
sentences.cn: 这是战后建的一座普通的半独立式房屋。

sentences.en: Men were detached to defend the pass.
sentences.cn: 已经派遣了人员去防守关隘.

sentences.en: She sounded so detached and impersonal that he began to feel exasperated.
sentences.cn: 这摆明出来的好像是第三者的态度,却把范博文激怒了.

sentences.en: The coupon is not valid if detached.
The general detached a small force to go and guard the palace.
sentences.cn: 将军派遣一支小部队去保卫宫殿.

sentences.en: There was an accident when the towrope detached from the car.
sentences.cn: 当拖绳从车子上脱落时发生了事故。

sentences.en: They are thick - walled , are not easily detached from the mycelium.
sentences.cn: 它们是 厚壁 的, 是不易从菌丝体上脱落的.

sentences.en: They detached their trailer and set up camp.
sentences.cn: 他们卸下拖车,架起帐篷.

sentences.en: Through all the arguments among other committee members, she kept a detached attitude.
sentences.cn: 在其他委员会成员辩论时, 她始终保持超然的态度.

sentences.en: Try to take a more detached view .
sentences.cn: 尽量采取更为客观的态度。

words.tran_cn: 可分开的；可拆开的；可分遣的
分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队

phrases.tran_cn: 独立式住宅；独立式房子

trans.tran_cn: 超然的，冷漠的，客观的，（房屋）独立的
trans.tran_en: not reacting to or becoming involved in something in an emotional way

trans.tran_cn: （使）分开，摆脱，派遣（detach的过去式和过去分词）
